long_description: With its canted bottle design for easy grabbing, the Nathan Trek waistpack is all about access! Slanted bottle holster was designed for the natural movement of your arm to grab a drink without you missing a step. Included 22 fl. oz. bottle features a finger loop, making it a no-hassle snap to grab; QuickClip(TM) gate lets you attach bottle to a pack or belt. Zippered back pocket is perfect for stashing an energy bar, keys and ID. 3M Scotchlite(TM) reflective piping enhances visibility in low-light conditions. Padded, moisture-wicking backing keeps you comfortable. The Nathan Trek waistpack fits 26- to 46-inch waists.
short_description: With its canted bottle design for easy grabbing, the Nathan Trek waistpack is all about access!
